3.0.0.en: Update to SDK3 (requires Homey firmware 5.x). Change the relay functionality from a button to a slider under the device to avoid accidentally opening the door. Moved the functionality for adding the HTTP notifications from the app settings to the individual device settings for a more robust configuration. This requires you to re-configure your notifications though. See the support forum for more information.
